GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/topics/:topic.description: serves a single topic object by replacing :topic with the desired topic

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves a single user by replacing :username with the username of a user

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves the article requested by replacing :article_id with the integer id of the desired article

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comment.description: serves an array of comments left for the article identified by replacing :article_id with the integer id of the desired article

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: removes a single comment by replacing :comment_id with the integer id of the desired comment

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comment.description: Insert a comment into the database by specifying an integer article id and supply an object with properties of username and body

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Update the votes of an article by using the integer article id and supplying an object with the properties of inc_votes
